books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the events surrounding the attempted assassination of President Reagan in 1981.
books.name: KILLING REAGAN

books.author: by Tyler Oakley
books.description: Personal essays from the L.G.B.T.Q. YouTube personality.
books.name: BINGE

books.author: by Ben Carson with Candy Carson
books.description: A discussion of the Constitution by the candidate for the Republican presidential nomination.
books.name: A MORE PERFECT UNION

books.author: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.description: Applying the principles of Navy SEALs leadership training to any organization.
books.name: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: by Brandon Stanton
books.description: More photographs, this time accompanied by interviews, from the creator of the blog and the book “Humans of New York.”
books.name: HUMANS OF NEW YORK: STORIES

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Mindy Kaling
books.description: More personal essays from the comedian and actress.
books.name: WHY NOT ME?

books.author: by Dan Harris
books.description: A co-anchor of "Nightline" reports on the science and spiritual dimensions of meditation and how it has improved his life.
books.name: 10% HAPPIER

books.author: by Ta-Nehisi Coates
books.description: A meditation on race in America as well as a personal story by the Atlantic's national correspondent.
books.name: BETWEEN THE WORLD AND ME

books.author: by Bob Woodward
books.description: More revelations from the Nixon White House, based on documents supplied by Alexander Butterfield, the aide who disclosed Nixon’s taping system.
books.name: THE LAST OF THE PRESIDENT'S MEN

books.author: by Sarah Vowell
books.description: A look at the American Revolution through the lens of the Marquis de Lafayette
books.name: LAFAYETTE IN THE SOMEWHAT UNITED STATES

books.author: by Patti Smith
books.description: A meditation on art, loss and the past by the musician and author of “Just Kids.”
books.name: M TRAIN

books.author: by Elvis Costello
books.description: The musician describes his childhood, life and career.
books.name: UNFAITHFUL MUSIC AND DISAPPEARING INK

books.author: by Patrick J. Kennedy and Stephen Fried
books.description: The former Rhode Island representative describes his troubles with bipolar disorder and addiction and his subsequent advocacy for mental health care and research.
books.name: A COMMON STRUGGLE

books.author: by Jenny Lawson
books.description: A humorous treatment of the author’s experience of depression and anxiety disorder.
books.name: FURIOUSLY HAPPY
